```{r setup postgresql connection, include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(DescTools)
library(RPostgreSQL)

pg = dbDriver("PostgreSQL")
con = dbConnect(pg, user="postgres", password="Vivamus1431!!",
                 host="localhost", port=5432, dbname="bls")

data <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM state_unemployment")

data$month <- substr(data$period,2,3)
data$date <- paste(data$year,data$month,'01',sep='-')
```

```{r look at cali, echo = FALSE}
cali <- subset(data, area_text == 'California' & year >= 2006)

ggplot(cali,aes(x=as.Date(date),y=value)) + geom_line()
```
